statements: DELETE FROM fitness_attendance WHERE class_id = 10 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM fitness_attendance WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' AND attendees > 20;
DELETE FROM class_attendance WHERE attendance_id = 101 AND attendance_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' AND class_name = 'Yoga';
DELETE FROM ClassAttendance WHERE attendance_id = 100 AND class_id = 3 AND attendee_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id IN (SELECT instructor_id FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM ClassAttendees WHERE class_id = 101 AND attendee_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
